imdb.plot outline: HGTV is teaming up with nonprofit organization Rebuilding Together to pin two rival colleges against each other - all for a good cause. Teams from University of Michigan and The Ohio State University will go head to head in a remodeling challenge, giving two families much-needed home makeovers with some friendly competition along the way. Featuring Chris Grundy as show host and judge, this special will also feature DIY Network's Anitra Mecadon as the Ohio State coach, and HGTV's Chip Wade as coach of the Michigan team. The coaches will help each team bring their design to the top - and they'll do it all in two days! In the end, the families will come home to an amazing new space, and HGTV's expert judges will crown one team the challenge winner!
imdb.title: Raise a Roof: College Challenge
akas: Raise a Roof: College Challenge (United States)
